The decline in residual value from 2021 to 2023 likely reflects conservative assumptions due to market challenges, including intense competition and regulatory pressures in China, while the 2024 increase may signal improved outlook or adjustments in valuation models. The stable depreciation expenses suggest consistent asset utilization or changes in lease terms, indicating a strategic focus on maintaining lease portfolio efficiency amid evolving market conditions and the transition to electric vehicles.
